General.Name: MHC Plantations Bhd
General.Description: MHC Plantations Bhd., an investment holding company, engages in cultivating, milling, and selling oil palm products in Malaysia. It operates through three segments: Plantation, Oil Mill, and Power Plant. The company offers fresh fruit bunches, crude palm oil, and palm kernel. It is also involved in the operation of a hotel; property investment and development, and housing development activities; power generation and sale of biomass by-products; and extraction and sale of earth stones. In addition, the company engages in the letting of oil palm fresh fruit bunches collection center. MHC Plantations Bhd. was incorporated in 1960 and is based in Tanjung Malim, Malaysia.
